remarks: Version of ~ ac6 with bound-variable hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2008.)
statement:
ac6sf.1 $e |- F/ y ps $.
ac6sf.2 $e |- A e. _V $.
ac6sf.3 $e |- ( y = ( f ` x ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ac6sf $p |- ( A. x e. A E. y e. B ph -> E. f ( f : A --> B /\ A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d B f x y $.
$d f ph $.
